mapper.sql: inner_a.id, inner_a.original, inner_a.user_id, inner_a.category_name, inner_a.category_id, inner_a.title, inner_a.summary, inner_a.content, inner_a.html_content, inner_a.cover, inner_a.status, inner_a.view_count, inner_a.comment_count, inner_a.like_count, inner_a.collect_count, inner_a.publish_time, inner_a.update_time, inner_a.reproduce, inner_a.deleted
mapper.select:
select outer_a.id, outer_a.original, outer_a.user_id, outer_a.category_name, outer_a.category_id, outer_a.title, outer_a.summary, outer_a.cover, outer_a.status, outer_a.view_count, outer_a.comment_count, outer_a.like_count, outer_a.collect_count, outer_a.publish_time, outer_a.update_time, outer_a.reproduce, outer_a.deleted, u.id u_user_id, u.avatar, u.nickname, t.id tag_id, t.name tag_name from ( select
from article inner_a where inner_a.deleted = 0
and inner_a.status = #{status}
and inner_a.title like concat('%',concat(#{title}, '%'))
and inner_a.category_id = #{categoryId}
and inner_a.publish_time >= #{start} and inner_a.publish_time <= #{end}
and inner_a.id in (select inner_a_t.article_id from article_tag inner_a_t where inner_a_t.tag_id = #{tagId})
order by inner_a.publish_time desc
order by inner_a.view_count desc
limit #{offset},#{limit} ) outer_a left join user u on u.id = outer_a.user_id left join article_tag a_t on a_t.article_id = outer_a.id left join tag t on t.id = a_t.tag_id
order by outer_a.publish_time desc
order by outer_a.view_count desc

select outer_a.id, outer_a.original, outer_a.user_id, outer_a.category_name, outer_a.category_id, outer_a.title, outer_a.summary, outer_a.cover, outer_a.status, outer_a.view_count, outer_a.comment_count, outer_a.like_count, outer_a.collect_count, outer_a.publish_time, outer_a.update_time, outer_a.reproduce, outer_a.deleted, u.id u_user_id, u.avatar, u.nickname, t.id tag_id, t.name tag_name from ( select
from article inner_a inner join article_collect a_c on a_c.article_id = inner_a.id and a_c.user_id = #{userId} where inner_a.deleted = 0 and inner_a.status = 0 limit #{offset},#{limit} ) outer_a left join user u on u.id = outer_a.user_id left join article_tag a_t on a_t.article_id = outer_a.id left join tag t on t.id = a_t.tag_id
select count(1) count from ( select date_format(a.publish_time, '%Y-%m') yearMonth from article a where a.status = 0 and a.deleted = 0 group by yearMonth ) temp
select date_format(a.publish_time, '%Y-%m') yearMonth, count(1) article_count from article a where a.status = 0 and a.deleted = 0 group by yearMonth order by yearMonth desc limit #{offset},#{limit}

( select a.id, a.title from article a where a.id < #{id} and a.deleted = 0 and a.status = 0 order by a.id desc limit 1 ) union all ( select b.id, b.title from article b where b.id > #{id} and b.deleted = 0 and b.status = 0 order by b.id limit 1 )
select c.id, c.name, c.parent_id, ( select count(1) from article a where a.status = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.category_id = c.id ) article_count from category c where c.deleted = 0

select t.id, t.name , ( select count(1) from article a where a.status = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.id in ( select a_t.article_id from article_tag a_t where a_t.tag_id = t.id ) ) article_count from tag t where t.deleted = 0
mapper.update: update article a set a.like_count = (a.like_count + 1) where a.id = #{id}
update article a set a.like_count = (a.like_count - 1) where a.id = #{id}
update article a set a.comment_count = (a.comment_count + 1) where a.id = #{id}
update article a set a.comment_count = (a.comment_count - 1) where a.id = #{id}
update article a set a.collect_count = (a.collect_count + 1) where a.id = #{id}
update article a set a.collect_count = (a.collect_count - 1) where a.id = #{id}
